lines.text: Ah, here comes that cute little Pink Ranger to the rescue.
Oh, you think she's cute, too, huh?
Well, pack your bags. 'Cause we're sending you back right where you came from.
Gee, a teenager with a big mouth. Not much has changed in 6,000 years.
You obviously don't know how who you're dealing with, Mr. Raisin Head.
Really?
Yeah. We're the Power Rangers!
Whoo! Where's my autograph book? Ha! Power Rangers, huh? So, Zordon's still using a bunch of kids to do his dirty work. Well, meet my kids.
[raises his army of Oozelings]
Adam? Adam, what is wrong?
I'm a frog.
Yes, a frog. Like the one you kiss to get a handsome prince.
What is that odious stench? Smells like teenagers.
the Black Plague, the Spanish Inquisition, the Brady Bunch Reunion.
You ooze, you lose.
[first lines]

Centuries ago, a legendary inter-dimensional being known as Zordon came to the city of Angel Grove to establish a command center for his never-ending struggle against evil. With the aid of his trusted assistant, Alpha 5, the noble master sought six extraordinary teengagers and gave them the power to transform into a superhuman fighting force. In time of great need, the young heroes could use their powers to call upon colossal assault vehicles known as Zords. The identity of the six remained a guarded secret. Today, that tradition continues...
You haven't changed, Ooze. You're still picking on creatures smaller than yourself.

Oh, put a sock in it, Z. Ten minutes out of the egg, and I'm already listening to one of your lectures. You locked me up into your stuffy little hyper-lock chamber and tossed me away into the depths like yesterday's trash. Do you have any idea what it's like to be locked up in a rotten egg for 6,000 years? It's boring. Not to mention I had a Charley horse since the Renaissance.
You won't get away with this, Ooze.
You robbed me of my prime. I was the supreme ruler of the most foul empire of the universe, and now it's time to pay the piper.
Oh, no! It's the Zords!
Yeah, Zords-Schmords. I'll crush them like roaches.
Well, if it isn't that double-dealing dough head.
I hope those Rangers put that lousy lowlife out of my misery.
Go, Rangers! Go, Rangers! Go, Rangers!
[last lines]
I am King Goldar, the ruler of the universe!
[Lord and Rita enter the throne room]
Uh-oh!
You know the funny thing about morphin'? You don't appreciate it till you can't do it anymore!
Taking over the world is one thing. Finding good help to run it for you, that's the killer.
Would you like me to make a few calls?
No need. I'm going to recruit the parents of Angel Grove.
Uh, no offense, boss, but they might find you a little disgusting.
[burps]
Well, I suppose you'll be the experts on that.

[grabs Mordant's snout]
You forget. I'm a master of disguise.
How could I forget? I never knew.
First, I'll turn them into zombies and them order them to dig up my Ectomorphicons.
Uh, how you going to do that?
By showing them the wonders of the wicked with a little bit of Ivan's ooze.
What? You spent 2,000 years looking for a tub of snot?
Patience, motormouth. Watch.
[the slime oozes out of the egg and morphs into Ivan Ooze]
Ladies and gentlemen, the Ooze is back!
He's so handsome.
Why, thank you.
You egg-sucking purple pinhead! The Rangers are going after the Great Power! I thought you said this guy was the master of disaster. He's nothing but a slime-infested jelly donut!
[Ivan throws slime over Rita's mouth]
Finally someone shut her up!
Your feebleness is staggering. You obviously need a vacation. I think circumstances force us to choose a new leader. And I pick... me!
Who does this clown think he's dealing with?
The Boogeyman is taking over.
[sits on Zedd's throne]
Nobody double-crosses Lord Zedd and lives!
[zaps Ivan with his Z staff]
Oh, stop it! It tickles! My turn.
[shrinks Zedd and Rita into a snow-dome]
Way to go, bonehead!
It's getting so you can't trust anyone in the galaxy.
Do you recall the name Zordon of Eltar?
[In response, Ivan Ooze rears his head back and roars furiously, firing lightning bolts into the sky]
I think he's heard of him.
Let's do it, guys!
Right!
It's Morphin' time!
[thunder roars]
Pterodactyl!
[Kimberly's morpher glows and we hear a screeching sound. She then becomes the Pink Ranger]
Triceratops!
[Billy's morpher glows and we hear a growling sound. He then becomes the Blue Ranger]
Tyrannosaurus!
[Rocky's morpher glows and we hear a snarling sound. He then becomes the Red Ranger]
Mastodon!
[Adam's morpher glows and we hear a trumpeting sound. He then becomes the Black Ranger]
Saber-Toothed Tiger!
[Aisha's morpher glows and we hear a roaring sound. She then becomes the Yellow Ranger]
White Tiger!
[Tommy's morpher glows and we hear the sond of wind howling. He then becomes the White Ranger]

[after Entering the Command Center]
Gee, pretty fancy-schmancy. I guess if you invest your money well in 60 centuries, you can buy yourself something pretty nice.

[a massive fireworks display spells out "Thank you Power Rangers"]
Power Rangers?
Bulk and Skull!
So, what are we going to do about the Power Rangers, o' my hideous one?
Ah, yes. The Power Rangers.
[snorts and spits out a blob of purple slime]
Good distance.
Yeah.
[the purple slime morph into 10 Tengu Warriors]
Shut your beaks! Now, my Tengu Warriors, you will fly to Phados, you will find the Power Rangers, and you will tear them apart!
So they've all been destroyed?
Well, we were about to destroy them.
What? You didn't kill them? You call yourselves Tengu Warriors? You are Tengu curses! I should have you all stuffed and roasted!
But, master, there was this monster with huge sticks. It kept twirling them around.
Sticks? Did these sticks have a whistling sound?
Well, it was more like nails on a chalkboard.
Dulcea. That miserable, manipulating, loathsome she-devil of a witch! If she leads them to the Great Power, everything will be ruined.
You want us to take another whack at it?
How about taking another quack at it?
[zaps the 10 Tengu warriors with a purple lightning bolt, they explode into black and purple feathers]
No time to waste. My Ectomorphicon machines must be unearthed by sundown.
Yo, fossil head! I've got a bone to pick with you!
I heard you're in line to be a Ranger yourself one of these days.
Nah. That's impossible.
Hey. Anything's possible.
You really think so?
I know so.
Fred Kelman, the Silver Ranger.
It does have a certain ring to it.
Fred Kelman, the Gold Ranger.
Zordon, you can't leave us! Ever since you came into our lives, you've been like a father to us all.

[Ivan Ooze arrives at Lord Zedd's palace]
Hi, Honey. I'm home.
Welcome to Jurassic Park.
Very funny, Adam.
The Power has been destroyed. It is gone. The Zords, the weapons, all of it. The Power Rangers are no more. Ivan Ooze has won.
We were told there was a great power here. Is it true?
Yes. The ground is littered with the bones of those who have tried for it and failed.
Well, we're different. We won't fail.
We need Megazord Power Now!
Ninja Megazord Power Up!
Desperate times call for desperate measures.
[smashes glass over emergency button]
What are you doing?
Taking care of business.
[Aisha pushes the button, the Megazord knees Ivan Ooze in the crotch, causing him to let go of it and fall back into the comet's path]
Hey, has anybody seen Bulk & Skull?
Ernie's serving a free dessert with lunch. They probably landed on the roof.
You guys make me sick
[Kicks one of Ivan Oozes Henchman]
, sick
[Kicks Henchman again]
, SICK!
[Kicks again]
UGH!
[Kicks Henchman, sending him flying upto the ceiling and down onto the ground hard]
We got them now, boss.
[pats Ivan on his shoulder]
Touch me again, you'll be chicken wings in the morning.

[to Goldar and Mordant]
Now you have a choice. You either serve me, or you can join these insufferable dingle-dorks!
[shows them Rita and Zedd inside the snow-dome]
Goldar, get us out of here!
Don't you listen to that purple booger!
Don't you dare betray me!
Uh, we never liked those dingle-dorks in the first place.
You said it. They stink.
You hungry?
Always.
Rangers, you must act swiftly, the planet is in grave danger!
Danger from what?

Six thousand years ago, a Morphological Being, known as Ivan Ooze, ruled the world with a reign of unparalleled terror. He was on the verge of completing construction of his ultimate weapons, The Ectomorphicon Titans, twin machines capable of enslaving the entire universe.
What happened to him?

A group of young warriors, like yourselves, lured him into a hyper-lock chamber and buried him deep underground; but now the chamber has been accidentally uncovered, you must return it to the depths, before it is opened and Ivan is released.
His Ectomorphicons were buried near the chamber, if Ivan escapes, he's sure to find them.
Use extreme caution Rangers, you are dealing with an evil here that is beyond all imagination.
The Stealth Eagle is about to fly.
Ditto for the Swooping Swallow!
Well, lead on, fly boys.
That's a lot of air.
After you, Skull.
What, are you crazy? This was your idea.
Hey, guys. You might might to slip those on.
[points their attention to parachutes]
Good idea.
Hey, this doesn't look like the target landing zone. Where's the free food?
You, idiot. All your kicking and screaming threw off the Stealth Eagle's sense of direction.
Stealth Eagle? Hah! Lame Duck is more like it!
What do I care about some stupid egg?
This is no ordinary egg.
Well, I say let's hard-boil the thing.
I'm with her. I'm hungry.
That's 'cause you're a pig.
I want you to destroy Zordon so that my evil once again remain supreme!
I will not only destroy him. I will obliterate his entire legacy. It will be as Zordon of Eltar never existed.
Finally, a *real* man.
Alpha, my sensors tell me the Rangers were too late. Ivan is on his way here.
Don't worry. Nobody enters the command center without a Power Coin.
[sees slime seeping through the Command Center's door]
Well, almost nobody.
Have you hugged your Zords today? HA HA HA HA!

[to Fred]
Rumor has it you're quite the hero.
That's my man.
I helped a bit. The Power Rangers did most of the work.
Hey, things got tough. You didn't panic. You, my friend, demonstrated true bravery.
It's like what you taught me about martial arts. Use your head, and above all, stay calm.
What do you think you're doing?
We're from the Angel Grove Building Inspectors Office
That building's supposed to be over there.
Yeah, and what's that man doing over there without proper foot protection?
Who's in charge around here, huh?
Huh?
Huh?
Huh?
Huh?
From this moment forth the world as you know it shall cease to exist. Welcome to my nightmare!
This can't be happening.
Um, you haven't by any chance seen a morphological being lurking around here?
Morphological being?
Yeah.
What the heck is that? Wait a second. Did it look something like this?
[Morphs into Ivan Ooze]

[the Rangers jump back]
Ew, gross.
You're too kind. Allow me to introduce myself, I am the galactically feared, globally reviled, universally despised - they call me Ivan Ooze.
Leave Phados before it's too late.
Look, we don't want any trouble. Our leader Zordon got...
Zordon? Did you say Zordon?
You know Zordon? Who are you?
I am Dulcea, master warrior of the planet Phados. What has happened to Zordon?
He was attacked by this cosmic being named Ivan Ooze.
Ivan Ooze is free?
You've heard of him?
Ivan Ooze is a monster. If we don't hurry, your planet is doomed. Follow me.
Take it home in boxes. Take it home in cases. If your parents try to stop you, just throw it in their faces!
Tommy, get your butt down here.
Falcon Zord, coming in to complete sequence.
[Falcon Zord finishes the Megazord sequence]
Ninja Falcon Megazord!
Hi folks, Ivan Ooze here. Are you bored with your job? Are you bored with your life? Then come on down to Ooze City, and let's get STICKY!
Ayiyiyiyi!
Ivan's evil plot has taken shape. I just hope they're not too late.
[All the kids of Angel Grove are enjoying their parent-free lives playing with Ivan's Ooze and partying]
Hey, everyone!
[whistles; everyone falls silent]
Listen up! You all think this is one big party, don't you?
Yeah!
Well, you've all been brainwashed. Ivan's taking over the planet and he's using all of us in his plans. And he's got our parents!
What are you talking about?
Look, Ivan Ooze is evil. And if you don't come with me right now, our parents are going to die! You've got to believe me!
